meanings.definition: The quality of being advantageous or beneficial.
meanings.sent1: The advantageousnesses of teamwork are clear when everyone helps each other.
meanings.sent2: She always looks for the advantageousnesses in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The cat's advantageousnesses in catching mice make it a valuable pet.
meanings.sent4: His smile had an advantageousnesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The advantageousnesses of exercise on health cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: The state of having an advantage or being in a favorable position.
meanings.sent1: In the game, his advantageousnesses allowed him to win easily.
meanings.sent2: The team's advantageousnesses in the match secured their victory.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's advantageousnesses in climbing trees amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her advantageousnesses in negotiations made her a successful businesswoman.
meanings.sent5: The advantageousnesses of being early to the meeting were evident when the important news was shared.
